2164.subject: SL
2164.descrlong:
Students explore social movements in service and social justice to understand the linkages between these two avenues for community development and activism. Through their own service experiences, students analyze systemic elements that perpetuate oppression and injustice, and develop their own capacities as catalysts for change by engaging in meaningful and respectful community work. (Offered spring semester.)  

(Prereq: Junior or Senior Standing)
